nodes.text: In the year 3643 BBY, towards the end of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the smuggler who would become known as the Voidhound and their associate Corso Riggs traveled to the Republic's capital world of Coruscant to hunt down the criminal Skavak, whom they had several scores to settle. They met with Coruscant gambler and informant Darmas Pollaran, who utilized his network of informants to help them.
